con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create Movie").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Movie").setPropertyValue('id', slurperresponse.id.toString() );

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Get Rate").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) expectedStars = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate").getPropertyValue('stars'); log.info expectedStars log.info slurperresponse.stars.toString() assert(slurperresponse.stars.toString() == expectedStars)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Get Rate").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) expectedStars = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate").getPropertyValue('stars'); log.info expectedStars log.info slurperresponse.stars.toString() assert(slurperresponse.stars.toString() == expectedStars)
